description: This file defines a global exception handler in a Spring Boot application, providing centralized handling for various exceptions and returning consistent error responses.

classes.name: GlobalExceptionHandler
classes.description: A REST controller advice class that handles exceptions globally in a Spring Boot application, returning structured HTTP responses for various error conditions.

methods.name: baseBody
methods.description: Creates a base response body containing timestamp, status, error message, used by other exception handling methods.

methods.name: handleNotFound
methods.description: Handles NotFoundException instances, returning a 404 NOT_FOUND response.

methods.name: handleValidation
methods.description: Handles validation errors from MethodArgumentNotValidException, returning a 400 BAD_REQUEST with details of field errors.

methods.name: handleIllegalArg
methods.description: Handles IllegalArgumentException instances, returning a 400 BAD_REQUEST with exception message.

methods.name: handleGeneric
methods.description: Handles unexpected exceptions, returning a 500 INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR with exception details.
